name: BluRum13
description: '''BluRum13''' (alternate spellings include Blu Rum 13, BluRum 13, and Blurum 13), born James Sobers, is an American [[Underground hip hop|underground rapper]], [[Master of ceremonies|emcee]], actor and producer who also uses the pseudonym Killa Platypus. Originally from New York City, he spent most of his formative years in [[Washington, D.C.]], and is the great nephew of knighted cricketer Sir Garfield Sobers.
